3rd Planet Brewing Skip to content Search for: Search Close a search form Close Breweries Charlotte, NC Breweries Other Breweries Bottle Shops Charlotte, NC Shops Other Shops Online Shops Bars Charlotte, NC Bars Other Bars Store Trading Cards Logo Merch Craft Beer Artwork NFT Collectables More Cards NFTs Map Reviews On Deck Closed Contact About Menu 0 Open a search form in a modal window 3rd Planet Brewing Written by Bob Posted on April 3, 2023 February 4, 2023 Leave a comment This is their “Mothership” location is quite large, featuring 26 taps inside and 4 more outside including several guest taps. 1400 E John Sims Pkwy, Niceville, FL 32578 3rdPlanetBrewing.com Dozens of outdoor picnic tables hosting events like live music and a family play area. Corn hole. Pet friendly. Substantial parking. Food trucks. Reportedly they do offer flights on quiet days but there’s frequently some kind of event taking place where it is suspended. About Us. Located in the historic Humane Steam Fire Engine Co. building in Royersford, PA, Lost Planet offers guests an exceptional experience providing a unique location to enjoy craft beer and an excellent gastropub fare in a community environment. We will be offering a private event space in the beautifully restored second floor which has charms to suit every taste and activity. We serve a wide selections of beers to suit any discerning palette in a turn of the century firehouse which pays tribute to those who build the fire house, worked there and served the community then and now. Connect with us Visit Us 301 Walnut Street Royersford, PA 19468 Hours MONDAY                                    CLOSED TUESDAY-THURSDAY              3PM - 10PM FRIDAY-SATURDAY                  11:30AM - 11PM SUNDAY                                    11:30AM - 8PM Phone 610-854-8351 Take Out Our Take our menu will be coming shortly!
